title: Blended Learning-Based Applied Mathematics Course for Engineering Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering mathematics and CAD software experience
context.additional_context: Course designed to enhance the job application skills of practicing engineering professionals, structured as blended learning utilizing Reusable Learning Objects (RLOs)

learning_goals: Learners can apply advanced mathematical concepts required for engineering problem-solving with 80% accuracy through RLO-based online modules.
Learners can write practical case analysis reports through collaborative problem-solving activities in blended learning environments.
Learners can revise and supplement personalized learning plans based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
